snippet: Advent International said on Sunday that it has agreed to buy a majority stake in the parent company of Serta and Simmons bedding, taking control of one of the country's biggest makers of mattresses.
abstract: Advent International said on Sunday that it has agreed to buy a majority stake in the parent company of Serta and Simmons bedding, taking control of one of the country's biggest makers of mattresses.
